abstract: Editorial reflects on decision by United States to begin bombing campaign against Islamic State group stronghold in Surt, Libya, at behest of country's fledgling government; suggests campaign raises issue of whether US has legal authority to battle Islamic State and suggests issue should be prominent one in presidential election.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The new phase of the military campaign against the terrorist group must include a viable long-term plan to help stabilize Libya.
snippet: The new phase of the military campaign against the terrorist group must include a viable long-term plan to help stabilize Libya....

headline.main: In Libya, a New Front in the War on ISIS
headline.print_headline: In Libya, a New Front in the War on ISIS
